alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 11:44AM EDT until July 23 at 12:30PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Suwannee County in northern Florida... Hamilton County in northern Florida... Western Echols County in southeastern Georgia... * Until 1230 PM EDT. * At 1144 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles southwest of Lake Park to Suwannee River State Park, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jasper, Jennings, Suwannee Springs, Statenville, Suwannee River State Park, Mayday, Blue Springs and Crossroads. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
